text: statute of limitations civil actions pfas exposure a civil action arising out of any harm or injury caused by a person or entity found legally responsible for or an action for any damages resulting from a pfas exposure may be brought within the years after the date the plaintiff discovers or in the exercise of reasonable diligence should have discovered such harm injury or damages and the causal relationship of an act or omission to such harm injury or damages nothing in this section shall be construed as limiting any action brought by the state
